Revo Uninstaller Pro v 3.0.7 is a tool for removing unwanted applications installed on your computer. The program has advanced scanning algorithm of the system before and after installation and allows you to remove remaining after the uninstall files, folders and registry keys. The unique "Hunter mode" offers a simple but effective tools to manage (uninstall, stop, delete, disable from auto starting) and to obtain information about your installed and / or running programs. Revo Uninstaller also offers an additional set of different tools to clean your system.
